effect.sun_moon: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.
